General.Name: Hoteles City Express S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Hoteles City Express, S.A.B. de C.V. operates and franchises a chain of limited-service hotels in Mexico, Costa Rica, Colombia, and Chile. It operates hotels under the City Express, City Express Plus, City Express Suites, City Express Junior, and City Centro brands. The company also leases commercial space for rent. It primarily serves business travelers. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Juan Salvador Agraz 69 Col., Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 05348
